name: warjok_tailwind
description: - public/ # Static files (images, favicon, etc) - dist/ # Build output - src/   - styles/ # Custom CSS/Tailwind files   - components/ # Reusable UI components   - assets/ # Project assets (images, fonts)   - pages/ # Page-level components   - utils/ # Utility functions   - input.css # Main Tailwind CSS entry - index.html # Main HTML file
